app.title: Avatarro: AI Avatar Maker
app.description:
Avatarro is the ultimate ai avatar maker and a character creator that combines the power of artificial intelligence with art. With Avatarro, you can easily create a new profile pic and get a realistic ai portrait that truly reflects your personality and style.

The simple user interface of Avatarro makes it easy and fast to create ai portraits. In just a matter of minutes, you can have a new profile pic that is truly unique to you. And with the unlimited number of avatars you can create, the possibilities for self-expression are endless.

Thanks to the advanced artificial intelligence algorithms that power Avatarro, you can create ai portraits that are not just simple characters, but realistic representations of you. Whether you're looking for a fun and playful avatar or a professional and sophisticated one, Avatarro has got you covered with more than 200 different avatar styles to choose from.

Avatarro also includes a powerful ai art generator and ai photo generator, making it easy to add filters and effects to your ai avatar. With this ai image generator, you can create ai photos that are truly one-of-a-kind. And with the stable diffusion of the ai generated art, you can be sure that your ai avatar will always look its best.

So why wait? Start using Avatarro today and experience the power of ai in art for yourself!

Features:

Avatar creation with AI
Simple user interface
Fast creation
Unlimited number of avatars
More than 200 different avatar styles

app.summary: Transform your selfies into a unique avatar with a stable diffusion AI generator

reviews.text: I used the app once to good results. And then it told me I had made my limit of images. Not "limit for today / week / month / whatever" or even " limit unless you become a paid user" - because there's no way in the app to such a thing. (That's right, the app doesn't have a way for you to send them money. Now that's an oversight you don't often see). Edit: thank you for prompt action.
reviews.replyText: Testing it again, you're right. We accidentally turned off the payment system. We just fixed it. The update is available with this fix. Hope you'll give it another try

reviews.text: I'm from a third world country, hence can't afford payments of this amazing app,therefore I wait daily and use my free 5 photos and I thank you for that. I look forward to when the limit will reach 100 photos a day. I enjoy the seasons avatars especially. Thx for this.
reviews.replyText: Wow, thank you for your wonderful review! We're overjoyed to hear you love our AI avatar maker and filter creator. We will continue to work hard to provide the best experience possible. If you have any questions or ideas, please join our WhatsApp community https://chat.whatsapp.com/KXMAQjPzOoa2HcH3z6BGVj

reviews.text: 1. This is a trial version and this trial version has ads. 👎 2. The images shown as thumbnails of the effect are not real because the generated effect is different from what is shown or expected.

WOW LOOK AT MY PROFILE PICTURE 5 STARS FOR THIS APP MY FRIENDS I RECOMMEND THIS APP TO ANY ONE LOOKING TO QUICKLY UPGRADE THERE LOOKS ITS SUPER FAST ON MY NOTE 10 PLUS 4K PHONE SCREEN THE QUALITY IS AMAZING I LIVE BELOW THE POVERTY LINE SO PLEASE MAKE A SMALLER CHEAPER VERSION IF U CAN MAKE A $5 OR $10 A MONTH VERSION U WILL HAVE ME AS A CUSTOMER FOR LIFE THANK YOU 😊 I AM USING THERE PHOTOS AND SENDING IT TO THEM TODAY TO HELP YOU ADVERTISE! I WILL EMAIL U THE PICTURES AND THERE COMMENT ASWELL

I downloaded this today and I'm uninstalling today. The one time I used it was for fun with my nephew, and him being 4, he wanted to see more. Then I get hit with "Reached limit, try again in 12 hours". Seriously? I understand that you need money from paid users, but this feels like a bait and switch for those who can't because I haven't seen anything to indicate that I could only make 1 picture every 12 hours. If there was higher limit like 5 uses before that, and been informed, I'd understand

I absolutely love this app! It brings my imagination to life in such creative ways, turning my ideas into reality with ease. It eliminates the hassle of researching and gathering resources by providing everything in one place. Whether you’re looking to transform your face into something entirely different or create unique visuals from scratch, this app makes it simple. Just choose, describe what you need, and watch as your ideas are turned into stunning pictures or videos.

Finally! Something simple and easy without signing up for all kinds of memberships and stuff! And it only costs if the user wants to save and share the content in HD without a watermark (which I don't really care about much).
Cost $5.99 per week! Says it can be enabled for a free trial but won't actually let you do anything except look at different styles.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your review! While our app offers premium features, we ensure that users can also enjoy free conversions daily. We are glad you're here and we hope you continue to enjoy our Avatar maker creating amazing avatars. If you have any more questions or feedback, please contact us at kallossoft@gmail.com. Happy avatar creating!

reviews.text: App is great but I paid for premium, which boasts unlimited creations. But when adding a 5th avatar, it said "monthly training limit reached". So I deleted my 4th avatar and now it won't let me add another one because of the same error. I was happy with the app up until this point. Also, no settings options exist, so I can't troubleshoot anything. There was no warning of a limit before purchasing. I'm hoping I don't have to wait a month to use the app again.
reviews.replyText: Sorry for the inconvenience. What we meant by unlimited creation is that you can get unlimited photos of yourself and some of your family members. The training takes 10 minutes of heavy processing and costs us more than we win on the subscription (at the moment). Sorry for the misunderstanding. Write us: kallossoft@gmail.com and we'll solve it

reviews.text: This app has the potential to be the best on the planet. After spending a few solid days, I was amazed with many incredible, realistic images, Unfortunately many filters, such as GYM, SUPER HERO'S etc, presented photos with 3 arms, 7 fingers on one hand etc, Plus the gender had to be changed multiple times, HEADSHOTS, look absolutely incredible 👏 If it wasn't for the above mentioned, I would gladly offer 5 star. ☆☆☆☆☆

app.AIReview:
Avatarro: AI Avatar Maker – A Detailed Review

Overview

Avatarro, currently boasting 1,047,945 installs and a solid 4.41/5 rating from 17,158 users, positions itself as the premier AI avatar creation tool. Leveraging Stable Diffusion technology, it promises to transform selfies into unique, realistic AI portraits that accurately reflect the user’s personality. The app is offered entirely free of charge, a significant draw for many users looking to experiment with digital identity and profile picture customization. At its core, Avatarro simplifies the complex process of generating high-quality AI art, aiming to democratize access to sophisticated portrait generation capabilities. The app's success, judging by its install count, suggests that it’s effectively meeting a demand for personalized online presence options.

Key Features

Avatarro packs a surprising amount of functionality within its free offering:

  • Stable Diffusion Integration: The foundation of the app is its reliance on Stable Diffusion, a powerful AI model known for generating incredibly detailed and realistic images from text prompts.
  • Selfie-to-Avatar Conversion: The primary feature allows users to upload a selfie and instantly generate an AI avatar based on that image. Users can adjust various parameters to refine the output.
  • Prompt Customization: Users aren't limited to just the initial selfie. The app provides extensive controls for refining the generated portrait through detailed prompts. These include specifying art styles (e.g., photorealistic, anime, oil painting), lighting conditions, facial expressions, and even adding background elements.
  • Style Presets: A selection of pre-defined style presets offers a quick starting point for users unfamiliar with prompt engineering, covering diverse aesthetic options.
  • Resolution Selection: Users can choose the desired resolution of their generated avatars, ranging from lower resolutions suitable for social media profiles to higher resolutions for printing or larger displays. (Although, larger resolutions consume more processing power).
  • Community Sharing (Limited): The app offers a limited community space where users can share their creations and browse others' work.

Strengths

Several factors contribute to Avatarro’s popularity:

  • Accessibility: Being entirely free removes the barrier to entry for individuals wanting to explore AI avatar generation without financial commitment. This is a crucial advantage in a market dominated by subscription-based services.
  • Ease of Use (Relative): The app's interface, while not perfectly polished, is relatively intuitive. The conversion process from selfie to avatar is remarkably straightforward, even for users with limited technical expertise.
  • Stable Diffusion Quality: Avatarro effectively harnesses the power of Stable Diffusion, consistently producing visually impressive and realistic AI portraits – frequently exceeding expectations for a free application. Many generated images demonstrate remarkable detail in skin texture, hair rendering, and lighting effects.
  • Prompting Flexibility: The level of control offered through prompt customization is a significant strength. Users aren't simply reliant on the algorithm; they can actively shape the final result to their precise specifications.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Avatarro isn’t without shortcomings:

  • Processing Time: Generating high-resolution avatars can be significantly time-consuming, sometimes taking several minutes per image, particularly when complex prompts are used or on lower-powered devices. This lag can disrupt the creative flow.
  • Interface Polish: The user interface feels somewhat dated and could benefit from a more modern design. Navigation isn't always intuitive, and certain controls feel less streamlined than they should be.
  • Limited Community Functionality: The community sharing aspect is underdeveloped. The browsing experience is basic, and there are limited options for interaction (e.g., liking or commenting on images).
  • Prompting Learning Curve: While the app simplifies prompting, mastering effective prompt engineering still requires some learning and experimentation. Users may initially struggle to achieve desired results without understanding the nuances of Stable Diffusion prompts.

User Experience

The user experience is generally positive, primarily due to the effectiveness of the core functionality – generating impressive AI portraits. However, as noted above, the interface presents a minor hurdle. The flow from selfie upload to avatar generation is smooth and responsive, but navigating between options and adjusting parameters can occasionally feel clunky. The app’s performance varies depending on device capabilities; users with older or lower-powered devices may experience noticeable lag during image generation. It's worth noting that the app relies heavily on internet connectivity for processing – offline functionality isn’t supported.

Value for Money

As a free application, Avatarro offers exceptional value for money. The quality of the generated avatars is comparable to paid AI art generators, and the ease of use makes it accessible to a wide audience. While premium versions with expanded features or increased generation speed may exist in the future, the current offering provides a substantial return on investment simply by virtue of being free.

Conclusion

Avatarro represents a significant achievement in democratizing access to AI-powered portrait generation. Its reliance on Stable Diffusion combined with an intuitive interface makes it a surprisingly powerful tool for creating unique and personalized avatars. While areas for improvement remain – particularly concerning interface polish and community features – the app's strengths, especially its free price tag and impressive output quality, firmly establish it as a leading contender in the burgeoning AI avatar market. It’s a highly recommended download for anyone interested in exploring digital identity creation or simply seeking a fun and engaging way to generate stunning AI art.
